Interactive Connectivity Establishment (ICE) protocol plays a major role in Lync Enterprise Voice and Conferencing. All these scenarios use ICE and STUN/TURN for media connectivity. When troubleshooting these scenarios, sometimes you encounter with ICE warning flags. It comes with the tag "ICEWarn" and a hexadecimal number (ex: ICEWarn=0x12b). You can find them in MSDIAGNOSTICS sections of related SIP messages. ... Web browsers play a key role in the IT industry especially in Systems Integrator
